Summary: black ship with orange/red, yellow, and white tail shooting from the back
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sun Prairie

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsseptember 2, 2008 12:20 am ufo sighting hwy 151 and main st. exit 101, sun prairie, wi my boyfriend and i were heading back home to sun prairie, wi from labor day weekend in the north woods. we had a couple of friends car pooling with us so we dropped them off in downtown madison first and then headed north\northeast towards home. we usually take east washington out of the city, which turns into hwy 151, and takes us all the way home. sun prairie is a fairly populated and growing suburb on the outskirts of madison. although it also has several beautiful farm lands, lots of open country and wild animals, it���s only about a 20-25 minute drive from the city. it���s far enough though to get out of the hustle and bustle of downtown life. we���re just not city folk so we love the country feel that sun prairie gives us. so we were heading ne on hwy 151, traveling the speed limit of 65, and we were about ��� a mile from our exit 101 ��� main st. when i spotted something and pointed it out to my boyfriend. i began slowing down, and almost completely stopped because there was no traffic behind us, and we were both watching in amazement while going down the list of possibilities���shooting star, no, comet, no, f-16, no. it seemed at first to be heading east then slightly se then quickly changed to a ne direction. it was only about 450-500 feet in front of us and about 500 feet up in the air and descending before it faced ne and completely disappeared. i first thought it was a comet because it had a tail of fire behind it and that idea quickly went out the window. then i thought it was a f-16 because the tail looked like an after burner although the color was orange\red, yellow and white and there were no shock diamonds so it was totally inconsistent with a true after burner, besides the fact that it was descending and there was no roaring noise that would of surely shook my truck and our ear drums. i could see no ship, no lights, and not even an outline of a ship, even with the street lights and town lights on. it seemed to be floating down slowly in front of us with fluid like motions as almost a jet ski would glide on glassy waters. when it did turn ne, we were looking at the rear of the ship and i could almost make out a ring, similar to a single engine military craft, against a black background, before the burner went out and completely disappeared into the night. the capabilities, maneuvers, and behavior of this craft are like none that the us military has made public or that i have ever seen before. i contacted the local police department to find out if there were any reports of strange sightings in the area, but there were none. i also phoned the local madison regional airport, where i know they do have f-16���s, and got a hold of operations where i was told the only landings and take offs were at 9:30 pm and 11:52 pm on sept.1st and 1:30 am on sept.2nd, none of which were f-16���s. the only planes reported to leave the ground or land were a crj (jet) and a learjet. we were so captivated by what we were witnessing that we didn���t even snap a photo. i am working on simulating the event in an animated movie and will post it when i���m done. this is not my first time experiencing mysterious lights and air craft in the skies and i do have some pictures of previous events in florida and colorado that i will also be posting on this site. honestly i have always been a little weary about sharing my photos and findings, for obvious reasons, but now that i have found mufon and have observed the good work they���re doing, i feel relieved, comfortable, and excited, and want to share mufon with all my friends and family! ps- i���ve attached a map of exactly where it happened and as i said above, i will be uploading an animated version of the event when i���m done.
